title: 3D Visualization-Based Anatomy Practitioner Training Course

context.additional_context: Anatomy Practical Skills Enhancement Program for Current Medical Professionals. Utilizing Smartphone-Based Supplementary Learning Tools

learning_goals: Can explain 3D structures of human organ systems with 80% accuracy
Can complete projects analyzing clinical cases using digital anatomy models
Can develop patient education scenarios based on learned anatomical knowledge

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
